member.name: T:MassTransit.WindsorContainerExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for the Windsor IoC container.

member.name: M:MassTransit.WindsorContainerExtensions.LoadFrom(MassTransit.SubscriptionConfigurators.SubscriptionBusServiceConfigurator,Castle.Windsor.IWindsorContainer)
member.summary: Specify that the service bus should load its subscribers from the container passed as an argument.
member.param: The configurator the extension method works on.

member.name: M:MassTransit.WindsorContainerExtensions.Consumer``1(MassTransit.SubscriptionConfigurators.SubscriptionBusServiceConfigurator,Castle.Windsor.IWindsorContainer)
member.summary: Register the type as a type to load from the container as a consumer.
member.typeparam: The type of the consumer that consumes messages
member.param: The container that the consumer should be loaded from.

member.name: M:MassTransit.WindsorContainerExtensions.Saga``1(MassTransit.SubscriptionConfigurators.SubscriptionBusServiceConfigurator,Castle.Windsor.IWindsorContainer)
member.summary: Load the saga of the generic type from the windsor container, by loading it directly from the container.
